import React from 'react' import{Link, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {Container, Navbar,NavLink,Nav, NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' function Navigation() { const navigate = useNavigate() const userDetails =JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')) const handelLogout =()=>{ localStorage.clear() navigate('/login') } return ( <>
Workout buddy {userDetails ? Logout : Login }
) } export default Navigation
